results.content: It is a very good introduction to PHP fundamentals and learn how to apply knowledge by doing a real life project. Second project is really good to improve your PHP skills and along with the integration of libraries such as JQuery datatables, faker, etc.. helps to soldify your project. However it would be nice if some OOP concepts were explained and project was made using PDO and OOP. Also, deployment part could have been added as a cherry on top. Anyway, it was a really good course for starting as a junior PHP dev.
results.content_html: It is a very good introduction to PHP fundamentals and learn how to apply knowledge by doing a real life project. Second project is really good to improve your PHP skills and along with the integration of libraries such as JQuery datatables, faker, etc.. helps to soldify your project. However it would be nice if some OOP concepts were explained and project was made using PDO and OOP. Also, deployment part could have been added as a cherry on top. Anyway, it was a really good course for starting as a junior PHP dev.
